'''Mikhail''' {{Lang|ru=Михаил}} is a member of the [[Fatui]]. After completing [[The Outlander Who Caught the Wind]], he and fellow Fatui diplomat [[Lyudmila]] can be found next to the Teleport Waypoint above the fountain plaza.

He is always seen talking to Lyudmila, and their dialogue changes to reflect the player's progress in the [[Archon Quests]].

NPC Location Lyudmila & Mikhail Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Lyudmila and Mikhail discuss the events going on in the [[Archon Quests]], with their dialogue changing as major events occur.

===Personality===
Mikhail has absolute faith in the Fatui's work, scheming different ways to use the situation on hand to manipulate things in their favor. He is annoyed at Lyudmila's pessimism regarding these events.

===Appearance===
Mikhail has white-gray hair and wears the standard male Fatui uniform.
